SA05n887:4: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 1 ||
SA05n887:8: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 2 ||
SA05n887:9: ratne dīpaṅkarākhyo maṇikusumajinaḥ śrīvipaśyī śikhī ca
SA05n887:10: viśvambhuḥ śrīkakutsaḥ sa ca kanakamuniḥ kāśyapaḥ śākyasiṃhaḥ |
SA05n887:12: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 3 ||
SA05n887:16: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 4 ||
SA05n887:19: ekāṃśaṃ pañca bhūtvā viharati satataṃ pañcabuddhātmako'sau
SA05n887:20: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 5 ||
SA05n887:21: yā prajñā guhyarūpā tridalakamalajā santu devaprasādā
SA05n887:24: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 6 ||
SA05n887:29: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 7 ||
SA05n887:33: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 8 ||
SA05n887:34: kruddhaṃ nāgādhirājaṃ kulikasamavidhaṃ trāsayan kīlavad yo
SA05n887:37: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 9 ||
SA05n887:41: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 10 ||
SA05n887:44: śvāsaṃ saṃdhāya bhavyaṃ sakalaguṇapadaṃ prāpya garteśasaṃjñāḥ
SA05n887:45: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 11 ||
SA05n887:49: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 12 ||
SA05n887:53: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 13 ||
SA05n887:54: śaṃkhaṃ dadhmau saharṣaḥ smaradamitasutaṃ vikramāt prāptasiddhiḥ
SA05n887:57: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 14 ||
SA05n887:59: pārvatyā yatra tepe kalahanivasane śāntatīrthaḥ praśāntaḥ |
SA05n887:61: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 15 ||
SA05n887:65: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 16 ||
SA05n887:69: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 17 ||
SA05n887:71: prādāt sallakṣaṇaṃ yaḥ svapayasi saratāṃ tīrthasallakṣaṇākhyaḥ |
SA05n887:73: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhātāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 18 ||

SA05n887:89: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 22 ||
SA05n887:93: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 23 ||
SA05n887:95: chitvā śoṣe hrade'smin puravarakamalo lokavāsāḥ parasya |
SA05n887:97: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 24 ||
SA05n887:98: saukhāvatyāśca vaṅgaṃ tadanu janahite potale prāgamad yaḥ
SA05n887:101: kalyāṇaṃ vaḥ kriyāsuḥ kvacidapi saratāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ naumyahaṃ tāḥ || 25 ||
